combatMove.name: Spin web
combatMove.description: Use [npc.her] spinneret to fire a stream of sticky webbing at [npc.her] target.
combatMove.availabilityDescription: Available to characters who have a spinneret.
combatMove.movePredictionDescriptionWithTarget: Use [npc.her] spinneret to fire a stream of sticky webbing at [npc2.name].
combatMove.movePredictionDescriptionNoTarget: Use [npc.her] spinneret to fire a stream of sticky webbing at [npc.her] target.

performMove.execute:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(point)] [npc.her] spinneret at [npc2.name], and before [npc2.sheIs] able to dodge out of the way, [npc.name] [npc.verb(fire)] a sticky stream of thick, strong webbing all over [npc2.herHim]! #IF(npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_WEBBED_3)) [##npc2.setHealth(0)]
[style.italicsTerrible([npc2.NameIsFull] now totally wrapped up in a cocoon, and as such [npc2.is] completely defeated!)] #ELSEIF(npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_WEBBED_2)) [##npc2.removeStatusEffectCombat(SE_WEBBED_2)] [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_WEBBED_3, 10)]
[style.italicsTerrible([npc2.NameIsFull] almost totally wrapped up in a cocoon, and as such [npc2.is] near to being completely defeated!)]
[style.italicsTerrible(If [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(get)] webbed again, [npc2.she] will be instantly defeated!)] #ELSEIF(npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_WEBBED_1)) [##npc2.removeStatusEffectCombat(SE_WEBBED_1)] [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_WEBBED_2, 10)]
[style.italicsBad([npc2.NameIsFull] seriously caught up in strong, sticky webbing, and as such [npc2.is] struggling to fight back!)]
[style.italicsTerrible(If [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(get)] webbed again, this effect will become extremely serious!)] #ELSE [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_WEBBED_1, 10)]
[style.italicsBad([npc2.NameIsFull] caught up in strong, sticky webbing, and as such [npc2.her] ability to fight back is impaired!)]
[style.italicsTerrible(If [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(get)] webbed again, this effect will become more serious!)] #ENDIF
